name: Get Gateway
description: Returns an object with a single valid WSS URL, which the client can use for [Connecting](#DOCS_TOPICS_GATEWAY/connecting). Clients **should** cache this value and only call this endpoint to retrieve a new URL if they are unable to properly establish a connection using the cached version of the URL.

name: Get Gateway Bot

response.name: url
response.description: The WSS URL that can be used for connecting to the gateway

response.name: shards
response.description: The recommended number of to use when connecting

response.name: session_start_limit
response.description: Information on the current session start limit

description: Returns an object based on the information in [Get Gateway](#DOCS_TOPICS_GATEWAY/get-gateway), plus additional metadata that can help during the operation of large or [sharded](#DOCS_TOPICS_GATEWAY/sharding) bots. Unlike the [Get Gateway](#DOCS_TOPICS_GATEWAY/get-gateway), this route should not be cached for extended periods of time as the value is not guaranteed to be the same per-call, and changes as the bot joins/leaves guilds.
